Name: Aarakocra
Information: A winged people who originated on the Elemental Plane of Air

Name: Aasimar
Information: Mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls

Name: Bugbear
Information: Neither bugs nor bears, they are the cousins of goblins and hobgoblins

Name: Dragonborn
Information: Humanoids shaped by draconic gods or the dragons themselves

Name: Dwarf
Information: Commitment to clan, and a burning hatred of goblins and orcs

Name: Elf
Information: A magical people of otherworldly grace and ethereal beauty

Name: Genasi
Information: Planetouched humans, infused with the power of the elements

Name: Gnome
Information: Enjoy every moment of invention, exploration, investigation, and creation

Name: Goblin
Information: A subterranean folk, they can be found in every corner of the multiverse

Name: Goliath
Information: Distantly related to giants and infused with supernatural essence

Name: Half-Elf
Information: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither

Name: Half-Orc
Information: When alliances between humans and orcs are sealed by marriages

Name: Halfling
Information: The comforts of home are the goals of most halflings' lives

Name: Human
Information: The youngest of the common races, late to arrive on the world scene

Name: Kenku
Information: Feathered folk who resemble ravens, blessed with keen observation

Name: Tabaxi
Information: Created by the Cat Lord to blend the qualities of humanoids and cats

Name: Tiefling
Information: Their appearance and nature are not their fault but the result of an ancient sin

Name: Tortle
Information: Tortles have a saying: “We wear our homes on our backs.”

Name: Triton
Information: Originally from the Elemental Plane of Water
